dcterms:creator: S. Makridakis
E. Spiliotis
V. Assimakopoulos
dcterms:description: The M5 Forecasting dataset involves the unit sales of the products sold by the retail company Walmart in USA. The products are classified in 3 different categories in 7 different departments, and are sold in 10 different stores in 3 different states.
dcterms:title: M5 Forecasting Dataset

dcterms:description: The data consists of the total residential natural gas demand in Turkey for 1000 days during the years 2018-2020, with each day considered as a single sample.
dcterms:title: Total Residential Natural Gas Demand in Turkey

dcterms:description: The dataset consists of synthetic data generated for testing ensemble learning methods, including various combinations of two independent data components.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Datasets (y{a}, y{b}, y{c})

dcterms:description: The dataset contains daily energy consumption production data in Turkey, used for forecasting energy needs.
dcterms:title: Daily Energy Consumption Production in Turkey
